Text:
The procedure for treatment

Activation Instructions:

  1. Run the patch (preferably as an administrator) and click Patch Hosts File.
  2. Install the program with sewn into the installer serial number.
  3. Enjoy the registered version of the product!

An alternative method (if the first did not work):

  1. Install the program with sewn into the installer serial number.
  2. Replace the original file is located in the Acrobat Adobelm.dll on modified from folder Crack, previously backed up the original file.
  If desired, after one run of the program with a modified file, you can revert back to the original file - it will work.
  3. Enjoy the registered version of the product!
